# Third-Party Source Origins

These libraries are vendored directly into the repository.
Below are the upstream URLs and the commit hashes they were pinned to.

| Directory | Upstream | Commit |
|-----------|----------|--------|
| bearssl | https://www.bearssl.org/git/BearSSL | `3d9be2f60b7764e46836514bcd6e453abdfa864a` |
| curl | https://github.com/curl/curl | 
`57495c64871d18905a0941db9196ef90bafe9a29` |
| quake | https://github.com/id-Software/Quake | `bf4ac424ce754894ac8f1dae6a3981954bc9852d` |
